considered the Superbowl of surfing but
surfing's sunny image is misleading as
revealed in a recent film called busting
down the door
the film celebrates how a group of
surfers from Australia and South Africa
and not native hawaiians pioneered the

the 1970s the surfers pt among them
proclaimed their surfing superiority
over the locals causing intense

whether it was us not being humble
